title: Particle System fails to load without 'premultipliedAlpha' being set in the options
body:
I just upgraded to the latest nightlies and there was a change in the particle system and editor that made it necessary to add 
    `premultipliedAlpha`
to the 
   `- Options -`
block or else the particle system wouldn't load in the game or in the editor. 

To not break existing projects I think it would be good to make premultipliedAlpha 
1. disabled by default and 
2. not mandatory in the decription of a particle system.

Stacktrace I encountered:

`````` java
Exception in thread "LWJGL Application" java.lang.RuntimeException: Error parsing emitter: - Delay -
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEmitter.load(ParticleEmitter.java:940)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEmitter.<init>(ParticleEmitter.java:94)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEffect.loadEmitters(ParticleEffect.java:158)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEffect.load(ParticleEffect.java:138)
    at de.qx.blockadillo.level.EffectManager.init(EffectManager.java:159)
    at de.qx.blockadillo.screen.level.LevelScreen.assetsLoaded(LevelScreen.java:223)
    at de.qx.blockadillo.screen.GameScreen.render(GameScreen.java:71)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.Game.render(Game.java:46)
    at de.qx.blockadillo.BlockadilloWithNoSettings.render(BlockadilloWithNoSettings.java:205)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglApplication.mainLoop(LwjglApplication.java:206)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.backends.lwjgl.LwjglApplication$1.run(LwjglApplication.java:114)
Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "- Count -"
    at sun.misc.FloatingDecimal.readJavaFormatString(FloatingDecimal.java:1241)
    at java.lang.Float.parseFloat(Float.java:452)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEmitter.readFloat(ParticleEmitter.java:959)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEmitter$RangedNumericValue.load(ParticleEmitter.java:1092)
    at com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.ParticleEmitter.load(ParticleEmitter.java:895)
    ... 10 more```
``````
